name: Biryani
recipe: A flavorful combination of long-grained basmati rice, tender marinated meat, and aromatic spices slow-cooked to perfection.

name: Pizza
recipe: A classic Italian delight topped with gooey mozzarella cheese, zesty tomato sauce, and your choice of fresh toppings.

name: Chicken
recipe: Succulent chicken pieces marinated in a rich blend of spices and grilled to a smoky perfection.

name: Burger
recipe: A juicy patty sandwiched between freshly baked buns, topped with crisp lettuce, tomato, and tangy sauces.

name: Idli
recipe: Steamed rice cakes made from a fermented batter of rice and lentils, served with coconut chutney and sambar.

name: Rolls
recipe: Soft flatbreads rolled around spicy fillings of your choice, be it chicken, paneer, or vegetables.
